identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a rental management platform that feels like a high-end architectural studio tool, not a spreadsheet.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Organic warmth.
Content is King: Data must be legible but beautiful.
Negative Space: generous padding to reduce cognitive load.

headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Marketing headlines. Tight tracking.

body.usage: Table data, form inputs, long text.

mono.usage: IDs, Reference numbers, Financial data alignment.

rules: Overlines must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest.

usage_rules: Primary color (Deep Emerald) is for Brand Identity and Primary Actions only.
Use Stone/Warm Greys for backgrounds, never pure white #FFFFFF for main background in light mode (use #F5F5F4).
Status Colors: Success = Emerald (#059669), Warning = Amber (#D97706), Error = Red (#DC2626).

spacing_system.philosophy: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for card padding.

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid (Tetris Mode). Mix col-span-1, col-span-2, row-span-2.

container_rules: Dashboard Cards: Flat, 1px border (border-border), no shadow by default. Hover: shadow-md.
Max Width: max-w-7xl for dashboard, max-w-screen-2xl for marketing.

shadcn_customization.Button: Rounded-md (not full pill). Font-medium. Hover: translate-y-[-1px].
shadcn_customization.Card: Remove default shadow. Add border. Use bg-card.
shadcn_customization.Table: Header: uppercase, text-xs, tracking-wider, text-muted-foreground. Row hover: bg-muted/50.

custom_components.StatCard: Must use 'Tetris' sizing. Big number (text-4xl), small label.
custom_components.StatusBadge: Pill shape, dot indicator + text. bg-status/10 text-status.
custom_components.ImageUpload: Dashed border, generous padding, drag-drop feel.

icons.usage: Use for navigation, actions, status indicators.

login_background.usage: Split screen login page, right side cover.

empty_state_keys.usage: Empty state for 'No Properties' or 'New Rental'.

tenant_welcome.usage: Tenant portal dashboard or 'Add Tenant' success screen.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered layouts without purpose.
Micro-interactions: Every button, row, and card must react to hover.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements must have data-testid attribute.
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios. Use APCA standards.
Motion: Use 'sonner' for toasts. Use framer-motion for page transitions if possible.
Theme: Default to Light Mode (Professional). Dark Mode is secondary but fully supported.
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the dashboard using the 'Bento' grid system. Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Strictly follow the color palette. Do not ask clarifying questions. Assume the persona of a high-end product designer.
